DOC.detailed_description: Interpersonal relationship one feature social environment show important influence health health behavior ( Berkman et al. , 2000 ; Berkman & Syme , 1979 ) mental health ( Tsai et al. , 2014 ) . While majority study conduct resource-rich setting , study conduct resource-limited setting similarly demonstrate association social network health ( Perkins , Subramanian , & Christakis , 2014 ) . In literature , tie two person important unit measurement . Classically , social tie typically elicit use `` name generator '' survey inquire tie base affective content relationship ( Laumann , 1966 ; Wellman , 1979 ) normative bond kinship tie ( Kleiner & Parker , 1976 ) . Another popular approach elicit social tie employ multiple name generator inquire specific type interaction , discussion important matter exchange money ( Burt , 1984 ; Marsden , 1987 ; McCallister & Fischer , 1978 ) . These type name generator strong face validity , less likely subjectively interpret different way different respondent , therefore likely reliable . These accompany heavy respondent burden , however , single-item name generator may perform comparably multiple name generator limit circumstance ( Marin & Hampton , 2007 ) . It remain unclear , however , whether order name generator may affect study participant response . While study examine empirically , broad literature public opinion poll suggest alternative specification question order important effect respondent ' answer ( McFarland , 1981 ) .
